Package ohos.media.sessioncore

Class AVSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.sessioncore.AVSession

  • public final class AVSession
extends Object
    Represents the media session provided for your application to control media playback.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ACTION_MEDIA_BUTTON  
      static String PARAM_KEY_EVENT  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AVSession​(Context context, String tag)
      A constructor used to create an AVSession instance to control media playback.
      AVSession​(Context context, String tag, PacMap sessionInfo)
      A constructor used to create an AVSession instance with additional session information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void enableAVSessionActive​(boolean active)
      Sets whether to activate the media session.
      AVController getAVController​()
      Obtains the AVController instance automatically created when this AVSession instance was created.
      AVToken getAVToken​()
      Obtains the token for your application to connect to this AVSession instance.
      AVCallerUserInfo getCurrentControllerInfo​()
      Obtains information about the AVController instance sending the current request.
      boolean isAVSessionActive​()
      Checks whether this AVSession instance is activated.
      void release​()
      Releases resources associated with this AVSession instance.
      void sendAVSessionEvent​(String event, PacMap options)
      Sends a media session event to all AVController instances listening for this AVSession instance.
      boolean setAVButtonReceiver​(IntentAgent ia)
      Sets an IntentAgent instance to receive the media button event for restarting the application via a media button.
      void setAVMetadata​(AVMetadata avMetadata)
      Sets metadata of a media item.
      void setAVPlaybackState​(AVPlaybackState state)
      Sets the current playback state.
      void setAVQueue​(List<AVQueueElement> queue)
      Sets a playback queue.
      void setAVQueueTitle​(CharSequence queueTitle)
      Sets a title for the playback queue, which will be displayed on a UI page.
      void setAVRatingStyle​(int ratingStyle)
      Sets the media rating system used for this AVSession instance, which can be one of the following: AVRATING_NONE AVRATING_STYLE_HEART AVRATING_STYLE_THUMB_UP_DOWN AVRATING_STYLE_3_STARS AVRATING_STYLE_4_STARS AVRATING_STYLE_5_STARS AVRATING_STYLE_PERCENTAGE
      boolean setAVSessionAbility​(IntentAgent ia)
      Sets an IntentAgent instance for this AVSession to start a UI page.
      void setAVSessionCallback​(AVSessionCallback callback)
      Sets a callback to control the player.
      void setOptions​(PacMap options)
      Sets additional information about this AVSession.

        public static final String ACTION_MEDIA_BUTTON

      • PARAM_KEY_EVENT

    • Constructor Detail

      • AVSession

        public AVSession​(Context context,
                 String tag)
        A constructor used to create an AVSession instance to control media playback.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        tag - Indicates a short name (usually the application name) for debugging.
        Since:
        3

      • AVSession

        public AVSession​(Context context,
                 String tag,
                 PacMap sessionInfo)
        A constructor used to create an AVSession instance with additional session information.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        tag - Indicates a short name (usually the application name) for debugging.
        sessionInfo - Indicates additional information about the media session. The information includes the application version and a list of custom commands supported by the session.
        Since:
        3

    • Method Detail

      • setAVSessionCallback

        public void setAVSessionCallback​(AVSessionCallback callback)
        Sets a callback to control the player. You need to define how to implement this callback.
        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback to implement for your application. For available callbacks, see AVSessionCallback. If this parameter is null, the control over the player will be ineffective.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVSessionAbility

        public boolean setAVSessionAbility​(IntentAgent ia)
        Sets an IntentAgent instance for this AVSession to start a UI page.
        Parameters:
        ia - Indicates the IntentAgent instance for starting the UI page.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the setting is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVButtonReceiver

        public boolean setAVButtonReceiver​(IntentAgent ia)
        Sets an IntentAgent instance to receive the media button event for restarting the application via a media button.
        Parameters:
        ia - Indicates the IntentAgent instance to receive the media button event.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the setting is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • enableAVSessionActive

        public void enableAVSessionActive​(boolean active)
        Sets whether to activate the media session. When the session is ready to receive a command, set the input parameter to true. If the session stops receiving a command, set the parameter to false.
        Parameters:
        active - Specifies whether the media session will be activated. Value true indicates that the session will be activated, and false indicates that the session will be deactivated.
        Since:
        3

      • isAVSessionActive

        public boolean isAVSessionActive​()
        Checks whether this AVSession instance is activated.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the session is activated; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • sendAVSessionEvent

        public void sendAVSessionEvent​(String event,
                               PacMap options)
        Sends a media session event to all AVController instances listening for this AVSession instance.
        Parameters:
        event - Indicates the name of the event to send.
        options - Indicates additional information about the event.
        Since:
        3

      • release

        public void release​()
        Releases resources associated with this AVSession instance.

        You need to call this method after the application finishes playback.

        Since:
        3

      • getAVToken

        public AVToken getAVToken​()
        Obtains the token for your application to connect to this AVSession instance. This token is used to create an AVController instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the token.
        Since:
        3

      • getAVController

        public AVController getAVController​()
        Obtains the AVController instance automatically created when this AVSession instance was created.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVController instance.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVPlaybackState

        public void setAVPlaybackState​(AVPlaybackState state)
        Sets the current playback state.
        Parameters:
        state - Indicates the AVPlaybackState instance representing the current playback state.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVMetadata

        public void setAVMetadata​(AVMetadata avMetadata)
        Sets metadata of a media item.
        Parameters:
        avMetadata - Indicates the AVMetadata instance to set.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVQueue

        public void setAVQueue​(List<AVQueueElement> queue)
        Sets a playback queue.
        Parameters:
        queue - Indicates the playback queue.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVQueueTitle

        public void setAVQueueTitle​(CharSequence queueTitle)
        Sets a title for the playback queue, which will be displayed on a UI page.
        Parameters:
        queueTitle - Indicates the title to set.
        Since:
        3

      • setAVRatingStyle

        public void setAVRatingStyle​(int ratingStyle)
        Sets the media rating system used for this AVSession instance, which can be one of the following:
        1. AVRATING_NONE
        2. AVRATING_STYLE_HEART
        3. AVRATING_STYLE_THUMB_UP_DOWN
        4. AVRATING_STYLE_3_STARS
        5. AVRATING_STYLE_4_STARS
        6. AVRATING_STYLE_5_STARS
        7. AVRATING_STYLE_PERCENTAGE
        Parameters:
        ratingStyle - Indicates the media rating system to set.
        Since:
        3

      • setOptions

        public void setOptions​(PacMap options)
        Sets additional information about this AVSession.
        Parameters:
        options - Indicates additional session information.
        Since:
        3

      • getCurrentControllerInfo

        public AVCallerUserInfo getCurrentControllerInfo​()
        Obtains information about the AVController instance sending the current request.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVCallerUserInfo instance providing information about the AVController.
        Since:
        3
